title: A1 steak TRANSIT
comment: In my last review I clearly stated this app is great... for various reasons!  However, I have one problem which is: scrolling back to the first initial/homepage.   Example; if I want to return to favorites and I'm 7 pages in. The only way to get back is to repeatedly hit the back key. Not a fun thing to do

Agreed. The navigation is not good enough.
A brand new UI is in the work but it'll take some time.

title: Parfait
comment: Fonctionne à merveille!
Super

title: Odd battery drain on nexus 4
comment: I really like this app but when looking in my battery use, this app was in the top power users with 10% share over a 20h period. That seems excessive given I only used it for less than 5min for that same period. Might be an inefficient background service. Too bad because it's an otherwise nice app.

Thanks for reporting the issue. Can you send as many details as possible to montrealtransit@gmail.com?
The app doesn't have a background service itself but maybe a 3rd-party library is causing the issue. Or maybe the GPS antenna is kept on after exiting the app.

title: excellent
